description: West Ham transfer rumours: Edson Alvarez, Dominic Calvert-Lewin
title: West Ham transfer rumours: Edson Alvarez, Dominic Calvert-Lewin
title_page: West Ham transfer rumours: Edson Alvarez, Dominic Calvert-Lewin - BBC Sport
maintext:
Monaco have made a second proposal to West Ham for Edson Alvarez, after their initial loan offer for the midfielder was rejected. (Mail, external)
The Hammers are poised to enquire about Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin before possibly making a move for the 27-year-old England striker. (GiveMeSport, external)
Want more transfer stories? Read Tuesday's full gossip column
